professional_summary: Oracle Database Administrator with expertise in Oracle 10g, 11g database administration, performance tuning, and data migration/upgrade.

key_responsibilities: Conducted performance tuning using AWR
ADDM
and Oracle Advisors.
Upgraded Oracle 10g database to 11g.
Applied quarterly CPU patches to different versions of databases.
Resolved log gap in Data Guard Configuration.
Monitored alert log files and trace files.
Implemented multiplexing control files and redo log files.
Performed database cloning and duplication using RMAN.
Installed and configured network components for database access and integrity.
Resolved Oracle connectivity problems and performed physical backups using RMAN utility.
Monitored user sessions and killed inactive sessions.
Performed standard and fine-grain database auditing.
Upgraded Oracle 11g databases from 11.2.0.1 to 11.2.0.3 using patch set.
Installed
configured
and managed 11gR2 (RAC) on ASM storage.
Managed RAC databases using CRSCTL
SRVCTL
and grid control.
Applied CPU critical patch on RAC database in a rolling manner.
Configured and setup Oracle 11gR2 Data Guard.

education.institution: Standard Computer Academy Lagos - Lagos, NG

Oracle Database Administration (2 years)",
